abstract: Cloud storage provider Backupify, which specializes in backing up data from social media services like Twitter and Facebook announced Tuesday that it raised $4.5 million in its first round of fundraising led by Avalon Ventures and General Catalyst Partners, VentureBeat reported.
snippet: Cloud storage provider Backupify, which specializes in backing up data from social media services like Twitter and Facebook announced Tuesday that it raised $4.5 million in its first round of fundraising led by Avalon Ventures and General Catalyst...
lead_paragraph: Cloud storage provider Backupify, which specializes in backing up data from social media services like Twitter and Facebook, announced Tuesday that it raised $4.5 million in its first round of fund-raising, led by Avalon Ventures and General Catalyst Partners, VentureBeat reported.
